titles.title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel Encore.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/26/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.
